services.title: Web/Developer
services.modalDescription: Design and development of responsive websites.
details: Create websites that adapt to all screens while providing a smooth and consistent user experience.
Save on web development! Responsive Design allows you to adapt a single site to all devices.
Expand your audience while strengthening your online presence through compatibility on different devices.
Improved SEO: Search engines favor optimized responsive sites.

services.title: Web/Integrator
services.modalDescription: Creating dynamic, interactive, and user-friendly websites.
details: Design elegant and intuitive user interfaces for an optimal user experience.
Integrate real-time data using cutting-edge APIs.
Leverage the latest front-end technologies for innovative websites.
Ready to explore further?

services.title: Web/UX/Design
services.description: Bring your dreams come true ! Turn them into reality !
services.modalDescription: Bring your dreams to life! Transform them into reality!
details: Turn your graphic designs into interactive websites.
Our Figma and PSD to HTML/CSS mockup integration service is at your disposal!
We breathe life into your graphic designs by creating fully responsive, interactive websites.
Have ideas to materialize?

services.title: Code/Crafters
services.description: A complete range of services for your website.
services.modalDescription: Looking to optimize your online presence? We offer a complete range of services to ensure the performance and relevance of your website.
details: Maintenance: We ensure your website remains stable and functional by conducting regular checks, fixes, and essential updates.
Updates: Technologies evolve rapidly. We take care of updating your site with the latest features and enhancements to stay competitive.
Integration Testing: Ensuring your website's compatibility across various browsers and platforms is crucial. Our tests ensure an optimal user experience.
Data Integration: We enrich your website by integrating real-time data, APIs, and interactive features to engage your visitors.

services.title: SEO
services.description: The service range that maximizes the visibility of your site.
services.modalDescription: The service range that maximizes the visibility of your website.
details: Because we understand the importance of SEO for the growth of your online business.
A complete range of services to ensure the performance and relevance of your website.
SEO Optimization: Improving the technical performance of the site enhances its ranking in search engines.
Competitive Monitoring: To stay ahead, we monitor the latest changes in search algorithms to constantly update your site.
Keyword Analysis: Our team conducts in-depth keyword research to target the most relevant terms for your industry.
Quality Content: We create keyword-rich, high-quality content to attract and retain your target audience.

services.title: Freelance/Consulting
services.description: Your partner for successful online consultation.
services.modalDescription: Your partner for successful online consultation.
details: Online consultation is more important than ever, and we are committed to offering quality online consultation solutions.
Personalized Expertise: Solve your problems, achieve your goals, all online, for added convenience.
Flexibility: Your time is precious. A flexible solution that fits your schedule.
Free Trial: Try our online consultation service for free and discover how we can help you progress.
